description: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3.0 seconds.
notes: Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
A medium weave of metal chains.
A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

description: Passive: Pierce - Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage.
lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
A hammer forged of pure mithril.
Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

description: Active: Chop Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards.
Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
notes: Cannot carry more than one.
Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

description: Use: Consume the Faerie Fire to instantly restore 75 HP
lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

description: Passive: Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 50 damage. Comes with 5 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.
notes: Uses at most one charge per damage instance.
lore: Elemental protection from magical assaults.

description: Passive: Gives increased movement speed.
notes: Multiple instances do not stack.
lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels
A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

description: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

description: Use: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed. Does not stack.
Passive: Shade Sight - Grants 300 bonus night vision.
Castable on aliles.
notes: The bonus night vision works during Night Stalker's Darkness ability.
lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.
Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

description: Active: Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.
lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.
A valued accessory for improving vitality.
A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
You grow stronger just by holding it.
A long blade imbued with time magic.
A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

description: Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.
Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

notes: Ring of Regen is shareable.
lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

notes: Sage's Mask is shareable.
lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

description: Passive: True Sight - Adds the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within its carrier's range.
Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
notes: Disabled while on a courier.
lore: Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

description: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

description: Use: Consume to instantly restore health and mana.
notes: Cheese is shareable.
lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

description: Active: Energy Charge - Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 10) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.
notes: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

description: Active: Energy Charge - Instantly restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored. Gains a charge (max 17) whenever a nearby visible enemy uses an ability.
notes: Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

description: Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form, becoming immune to physical damage, yet unable to attack and taking 40% extra magic damage.
Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ghost Form.
notes: Ends if you become Spell Immune, and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune.
Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

description: Use: Restores mana to the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

description: Use: Consume the mango to instantly restore 150 mana.
Hold Control to use Enchanted Mango on an allied hero.
lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

description: Use: Restores health to the target unit over time. If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

description: Use: Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.
notes: Places a buff on enemy units in the area that prevents them from becoming invisible.
lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.

description: Use: Regenerate - Consumes a charge to restore Health and Mana over time. Healing stops if attacked. Bottle can be refilled at your team's fountain. Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use, and are activated automatically after 2 minutes. If Bottle does not have full charges and is placed on a courier, the courier will move 30% slower.
Hold Control to use Regenerate on an allied hero. Stored runes cannot be shared.
notes: Bottle is shareable.
Bounty runes replenish 2/3 charges.
lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

description: Use: Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives vision of its surrounding area to your team. Lasts 6 minutes.
Observer Wards have a Fog of War simulator to show you the area the ward will reveal (taking into account trees and terrain height).
Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.
lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

description: Use: Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range. Lasts 4 minutes.
Purchased in packs of 1.
Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.
lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

description: Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.

Use: Plant the currently active ward to keep watch over an area. Observer Wards reveal their surrounding area to your team. Sentry Wards grant True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within its range.
lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.

description: Use: Eat a Tree or Ward - Consume a target tree or ward to gradually restore health.
Comes with 4 charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.
notes: Heals for double duration when used on a Ironwood Tree or Wards.
lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

description: Use: Deploy Courier - Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

description: Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
notes: If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.
lore: What a hero truly needs.

description: Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain. Upgradable to allow you to teleport to allied heroes.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
notes: Shares cooldown with Town Portal Scrolls.
lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

description: Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. The increased movement speed is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.
Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.
A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.
An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

notes: Ring of Health is shareable.
lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

notes: Void Stone is shareable.
lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.
Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.
This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.
A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

description: Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.

Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi. Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack, nor does the attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads.
lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

description: Active: Transmute - Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience. Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.
notes: The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

notes: Perseverance is shareable.
lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

description: Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a 50% chance to block damage from creeps.
notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
A small gemstone attached to several chains.

description: Active: Restore - Heals 250 health and gives +2 armor to allied units in a 900 radius.
Passive: Mekansm Aura - Grants 4 health regeneration to allied units in a 900 radius.
Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
notes: Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

description: Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants lifesteal, health regeneration, mana regeneration, bonus attack damage, and armor to allies in a 900 radius. The lifesteal percentage is based on whether the hero affected by the aura is melee or ranged.
Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

description: Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base.
Requires a deployed Animal Courier.
lore: The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.

description: Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +2 armor to all allied units in a 900 radius. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.
lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

description: Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect.
Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.
Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

description: Active: Barrier - Gives a shield that blocks 400 spell damage to all allies in a 900 radius.
Passive: Insight Aura - Gives allied units 4 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance in a 900 radius.
notes: Multiple instances of Barrier do not stack.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

description: Active: Soul Release - Heals health over time to friendly units, but deals pure damage over time to enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected ally takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.
Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.
notes: Empty urns gain 2 charges.
If used on a hero with Soul Release already active on them, it will refresh its duration.
lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

description: Passive: Regeneration Aura - Restores health to allies in a 900 unit radius.
Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

description: Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Instantly destroys illusions.
notes: The target will have a base movement speed of 140, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

description: Active: Soul Burn - Silences the target unit for 5.0 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30.0% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.
lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

description: Active: Silences a target for 5.0 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30.0%. All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and land a crit on impact.
Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
notes: Amplified damage is dealt at the end of the duration as magical damage.
lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

description: Passive: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 0.6 second 100% movement speed slow on each strike.
lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

description: Active: Cyclone - Sweeps a target unit up into cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
notes: You cannot cyclone allies.
Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.Cyclone can purge some buffs and debuffs.
lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

description: Passive: Increases spell cast range by 220 and spell damage output by 5%
lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

description: Active: Force - Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. Double click to instantly cast Force on yourself.
notes: Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

description: Active: When used on an enemy, it pushes you both away from each other 450 units each, and allows you to attack the target without range restrictions for 4 attacks for a maximum of 5.0 seconds. Grants 100 Attack Speed during the attacks. Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.
Passive: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
notes: Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

description: Active: Energy Burst - Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

description: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 40 seconds, whose strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon is upgraded. Warrior gains True Sight at level 3. Upgradable.
lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

description: Passive: Ultimate Upgrade - Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.
lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

description: Active: Reset Cooldowns - Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

description: Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases the armor of nearby enemies.
Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

description: Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second. If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for 5 seconds for melee heroes, or 7 seconds for ranged heroes.
lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

description: Active: Avatar - Grants Spell Immunity and 100% Magic Damage Resistance. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Some abilities are able to disable through Avatar.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
notes: Purchasing another Black King Bar will not reset its immunity duration.
Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

description: Passive: Reincarnation - Brings you to life with full health and mana 5.0 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

description: Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds.
Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces the attack speed of all enemies in a 900 radius.
Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
notes: The wave extends at a speed of 350 to a max size of 900.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

description: Active: Pocket Deny - Instantly causes you to die.

Passive: Bloodpact - Begins with 12 charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge grants 1 mana regeneration per second, and reduces respawn time by 3 seconds. If the bearer dies, 500 +30 health per charge is restored to all allies within a 1675 radius, while the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges.
notes: Only the first Bloodstone will gain charges.
lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

description: Passive: Spellblock - Blocks most targeted spells once every 13.0 seconds.
Active: Transfer Spellblock - Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit.
lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

description: Active: Echo Shell - Applies a shield to the target unit which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster. The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. Dispels negative buffs when applied.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

description: Passive: Damage Block - Grants the wielder a 50% chance to block damage from incoming attacks based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

description: Active: Guard - Grant nearby allied heroes and buildings a 100% chance to block 60 damage from each incoming attack, along with 2 armor. Lasts 10 seconds.
Passive: Damage Block - Grants the wielder a 50% chance to block damage from incoming attacks based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
Guard does not affect units that have been affected by Guard in the last 46 seconds.
lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

description: Active: Damage Return - Reflects any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage. Lasts 4.5 seconds.
notes: Damage Return is calculated before any kind of reduction.
Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other forms of Blademail.
Returned damage type is the same as it was received.
Can pierce Spell Immunity if the original damage type does.
Returned damage does not provide lifesteal.
lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
Regain lost courage.

description: Active: Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage.
notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

description: Drops on death. Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
notes: If Divine Rapier is dropped and picked up by an enemy of its original owner, it cannot be dropped again except by death.
lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

description: Passive: Mini-Bash - Grants each attack a chance to deal bonus damage and deal a mini-stun.
Passive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing. True Strike does not work when attacking enemy structures.
lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

description: Active: Toggle Burn - When active, scorches nearby enemies for 60 damage per second and blinds them, causing them to miss 17% of their attacks.
lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

description: Active: Flutter - Trade evasion for 35% additional movement speed for 4.0 seconds.
Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

description: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

description: Passive: Bash - Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
notes: Does not stack with other sources of Bash, however it will stack with Mini-Bash (e.g. Monkey King Bar).
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

description: Active: Chop Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targetting wards.
Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee. Does not provide bonus damage against Roshan.
Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a area around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.
notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
Cleave damage goes through spell immunity.
If multiple sources of Cleave are present, each Cleave's damage is applied separately.
Chop can be used to destroy Techies' Remote Mines.
lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

description: Active: Mirror Image - Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee heroes have a 30 second cooldown on this ability, while for Ranged heroes the cooldown is 45 seconds.
Melee images deal 33% damage and take 350% damage, while Ranged images deal 28% and take 400% damage.
Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
notes: Has a 0.1 second cast time during which you are invulnerable.
Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

description: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants each attack a chance to deal additional damage. Critical Strike does not work against buildings.
lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

description: Passive: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.
notes: Multiple instances do not stack.
lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

description: Active: Toggle Unholy Strength - When active, Unholy Strength grants +31 damage and +25 strength, but drains 45 health per second. You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
notes: The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.
The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds.Activating or deactiving Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling.
lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

description: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus damage on that attack. Lasts 14.0 seconds.
notes: Has a 0.3 second fade time.
If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

description: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move 20% faster and can move through units. Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 225 bonus damage to the target, disable their passive abilities, and reduce their damage output.
notes: Backstab cannot miss.
Backstab does not pierce spell immunity.
lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

description: Passive: Greater Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5.0 seconds.
Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

description: Active: Unholy Rage - Increases Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 4.5 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.
Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

description: Active: Static Charge - Places a charged shield on a target unit which has a % chance to release a shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and additional enemies.
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between targets, dealing magical damage to each.
notes: Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second.

Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than 900 range away.Static Charge procs will not bounce to heroes that are invisible or hidden by Fog of War.
lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

description: Passive: Cold Attack - Each attack slows the movement and attack speed of the target. The duration of the slow is based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
notes: Lasts 5 seconds with melee Eye of Skadi, 2.5 seconds with ranged Eye of Skadi.
lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

description: Passive: Lesser Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5.0 seconds.
lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

description: Active: Dominate - Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 425. If a dominated creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.
notes: Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time. If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
Selling or upgrading Helm of the Dominator will cause dominated units to die.
Dominated creeps have a bounty of 125 gold.
lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

description: Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between targets, dealing magical damage to each.
lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

description: Passive: Corruption - Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.
Desolator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
notes: Armor reduction works on buildings.
lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

description: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

description: Active: Berserk - Gives 120 attack speed and 17% movement speed, but reduces your armor by 5 and silences you. Lasts 8.0 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt.
Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

description: Active: Purge - Targets an enemy, removing buffs from the target and slowing it for 4.0 seconds.

Passive: Manabreak - Each attack burns 50 mana from the target, and deals 0.8 physical damage per burned mana. Burns 16 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions. Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
Upgradable.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

description: Active: Ether Blast - Launches a projectile which converts the target to ethereal form, increasing any incoming magic damage they take, while rendering them immune to physical damage and unable to attack. Can be cast on self. If the target is an enemy, it is also slowed, and takes 2.0x your primary attribute +75 as magical damage.
Using a Town Portal Scroll or Boots of Travel will not dispel Ethereal Form.
notes: Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter.
Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage.Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

description: Active: Sacrifice - Consume 150 health to temporarily gain 150 mana. Lasts 10 seconds.
notes: If the mana gain cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool. If this mana is not used before the duration ends, the extra mana is lost.
lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

description: Active: Replenish Mana - Restores mana to all allies in a 900 area around the hero.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
notes: Does not work on Meepo clones.
lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

description: Passive: Cooldown Reduction - Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.
Passive: Spell Lifesteal - A percentage of damage caused by spells is returned to the caster as health.
lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

description: Passive: Poison Attack - Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing movement based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

description: Passive: Your attacks reduce target's armor for 8.0 seconds.
Blight Stone is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

description: Active: Endurance - Gives bonus +25 attack speed and +13% movement speed to allies in a 900 radius.
Passive: Swiftness Aura - Gives bonus movement speed to allies in a 900 radius.
Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.
notes: Re-purchasing the Drum of Endurance recipe will refresh its charges.
lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

description: Active: Valor - If cast on an ally, increases their armor while reducing the caster's. If cast on an enemy, reduces the armor of both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target magic immune enemies.
lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

description: Active: Shine - Temporarily removes the armor and evasion from Solar Crest. When cast on an ally it grants them 10 armor and 25% evasion. When cast on an enemy, it removes 10 of their armor and blinds them, causing them to miss 25% of their attacks. Cannot target magic immune enemies.
lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

description: Use: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisibility and bonus movement speed for a brief time. Minimap icons will also be hidden. Attacking, or moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility.
lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

description: Use: Grants you 500 experience plus 135 per tome comsumed by your team.
lore: That which raises beast to man and man to god.

description: Active: Magic Weakness - Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts 16.0 seconds.
notes: Can be dispelled.
lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.

description: Active: Mend - Restores 250 health and 160 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative buffs from the caster.
Passive: Guardian Aura - Provides nearby allies with 4 health regeneration and 2 bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 15 health regeneration and 15 armor.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
notes: The aura boost only applies to heroes.
lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

description: Active: Cripple - Roots the target for 2.0 seconds.
lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

description: Active: Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove 40% of its current HP.
Passive: Quell - Increases attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
notes: Has a 4 second cooldown on Trees.
Cannot target ancients.
lore: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.

description: Active: Overwhelm - Stuns a target enemy unit for seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.
Passive: Bash - Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 85 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
Passive: Damage Block - Grants the wielder a 50% chance to block damage from incoming attacks based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
notes: The stun is melee range.
Doesn't stack with other bashes.The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

description: Active: Disarm - Prevents a target from attacking. Lasts 3.0 seconds on melee targets, and 5.5 seconds on ranged targets.
Passive: Lesser Maim - Each attack has a chance to slow the enemy's movement and attack speed for 5.0 seconds.
Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
notes: Disarm can only be removed with spell immunity.
lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

description: Passive: Aquila Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 area of effect.
Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.
Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.
notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

description: Passive: Break - Whenever you attack or are attacked, the health regeneration and 30 Movement Speed are lost for 13 seconds.
lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

description: Active: Fade - Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero after a 1.2 second fade time. Moving breaks the invisibility. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.
lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

description: Active: Glimmer - After a 0.6 second delay, grants invisibility and 45% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit. Can be cast while channelling.
lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.
